summary: Adds the killer rabbit from Monthy Python to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][u][b]I\'m planning on remaking this mod into something fun and less useless (sometime in the far future) until then its kinda crappy.[/b][/u][/color]

[color=green][u][b]Description:[/b][/u][/color]
The mod adds the killer rabbit from Monthy Python to the game. He doesn\'t affect stealth, can be used with a normal follower and can carry your items. He can be found in the Honeystrand Cave (see pictures). Also adds the Holy Hand Grenade to the game which can be found in the chest in the cave.
For those who don\'t know the killer rabbit (SHAME ON YOU!):
[youtube]QM9Bynjh2Lk[/youtube]


[color=green][u][b]Installation:[/b][/u][/color]
[NMM user]
Use the NMM the same way as always.

[Manual Install]
Copy Data folder to your Skyrim Directory.

[color=green][u][b]Uninstallation:[/b][/u][/color]
[NMM user]
Use the NMM the same way as always.

[Manual]
Delete the files from the date folder.

[color=green][u][b]Known Issues:[/b][/u][/color]
-The conversation box might get stuck and not work. [color=red][u][b]Figured the cause of this problem but did not have the time to fix it(did not yet feel like putting time in it).[/b][/u][/color]
[color=red][u][b]- Making a quick save and loading it should fix this.[/b][/u][/color]
- One of his legs might go a little crazy for no reason.

[color=green][u][b]Future Plan:[/b][/u][/color]
- Teach the killer rabbit how to fight.
- Fix Known issues.

[color=green][u][b]Credit:[/b][/u][/color]
SenorPato
Monthy Python for being awesome!

author: SenorPato
